title: Group Therapy: How do you tell your kids you're getting divorced?
description: A listener emails us asking how to tell her kids her and her husband are getting a divorce.  They don't ever fight and feel like it'll be a surprise so she wants to know any tips or advice of how to handle it.
itunes:summary: A listener emails us asking how to tell her kids her and her husband are getting a divorce.  They don't ever fight and feel like it'll be a surprise so she wants to know any tips or advice of how to handle it.
